name: Endless Democracy
description:
Welcome to 30000. The world now is populated by robots. Your mission is to drag the elections as much as possible by keeping the balance equal.
If one side has more than 60% votes, they win the election!

How do you influence a sector?
1. By sending SMSs (left click), but be careful, if you send too many you'll get blocked.
2. By giving an area a power cut (right click) so the robots can't vote.

In this modern age, elections happen every 10 seconds.

Credits: Alon, Chedvah
